oai_dc:dc.dc:title: UIMA/U-Compare OpenNLP POS Tagger
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a UIMA wrapper for the OpenNLP Tokenizer tool. It assigns part-of-speech tags to tokens in English text. The tagset used in from the Penn Treebank). The tool forms part of the in-built library of components provided with the U-Compare platform (Kano et al., 2009; Kano et al., 2011; see separate META-SHARE record) for building and evaluating text mining workflows. The U-Compare Workbench (see separate META-SHARE record) provides a graphical drag-and drop interface for the rapid creation of workflows.
